content.question: Which of the following claims did the author make in this excerpt?

choices.label: Ngola Arij was the legitimate ruler of Ndongo.
Queen Njinga had great respect for the Portuguese.
The Dutch pressured Queen Njinga into a military alliance.
Portugal’s defense of their African territory was very weak.

content.answer: Portugal’s defense of their African territory was very weak.

skill.text: 2.A: Identify and explain a source's claim(s), evidence, and reasoning.
